dmca.title: WebsiteHelpers.com Complains of Infringement by Competitor
dmca.body:
WebsiteHelpers.com
Web Design 
[private] 
Austin, TX 78713-8600
Links to Your Site
Web Hosting
E-Commerce
August 9, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: [private]  
[private]  
Mountain View, CA 94043


Dear Google:
I am writing to inform you that a website in your directory has stolen content from my site.
1. The copyrighted work that was stolen is the text at http://WebsiteHelpers.com (front page)
2. The infringing pages are: Search query: "same way you need a physical" (with quotes)
Infringing pages: 
http://www.emconsultinggroup.com 

http://www.anythingmarketing.com/hosting.htm
3. You can contact me at [private] @WebsiteHelpers.com.
4. I do not have any verifiable contact information for the owner of the infringing site.
5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the
 allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or 
the law.
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is 
accurate and that I am the copyright owner or ant authorized to act on behalf of the 
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private]
